name: Cook the Book: Ruby Grapefruit, Avocado, and Spinach Salad
description: Great grapefruits and creamy avocados are always lovely together but the magic of this salad comes from the fish sauce vinaigrette that dresses it. Similar to the sauce for the insanely awesome Momofuku Brussels Sprouts, this vinaigrette mixes sugar, vinegar, and ginger with pungent fish sauce, giving all the flavors in the salad a blast of sweet-salty umami.
recipeIngredient: 3 ruby grapefruits (1 lb. each), segmented, juice reserved
1 firm-ripe avocado (about 1/2 pound), pitted, peeled, and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange spinach on salad plates. Arrange grapefruit segments and avocado on spinach.
Measure 3 tablespoons grapefruit juice (save any extra for other uses) into a small bowl and whisk with vinegar, fish sauce, ginger, and sugar to blend. Spoon dressing over salads.
